definition: Ba state during Zhou dynasty (in east of modern Sichuan)/abbr. for east Sichuan or Chongqing/surname Ba/abbr. for Palestine or Palestinian/abbr. for Pakistan

to long for/to wish/to cling to/to stick to/sth that sticks/close to/next to/spread open/informal abbr. for bus 巴士[ba1 shi4]/bar (unit of pressure)/nominalizing suffix on certain nouns, such as 尾巴[wei3 ba5], tail
the West/abbr. for Spain 西班牙[Xi1 ban1 ya2]/Spanish

sentences.english: This season, however, has been the worst for Valencia in many years.
sentences.chinese: 但是这个赛季是巴伦西亚近年中最糟糕的。

sentences.english: "Obertan and Valencia are good players, " Park said.
sentences.chinese: “奥贝坦和巴伦西亚都是很好的球员，”朴智星说。

sentences.english: "Antonio is a bright footballing man and he picks things up very quickly, " he said.
sentences.chinese: “巴伦西亚踢球很聪明，他学东西很快，”他说。

sentences.english: Silva may be sold by Los Che to help balance the books at the club, who are in debt.
sentences.chinese: 深陷债务的巴伦西亚可能会卖掉席尔瓦来平衡收支。

sentences.english: Therefore many of the Valencia stars (who have little time for the current coach, Ronald Koeman) want out.
sentences.chinese: 因此，很多巴伦西亚球星想要离开球队。

definition: Málaga, Spain/Malaga city in Iranian East Azerbaijan

pinyin: La1 si1 pa4 er3 ma3 si1

definition: La Coruña or A Coruña (city in Galicia, Spain)
Gijón (Asturian: Xixón), city in northwest Spain on the bay of Biscay
Dortmund, city in the Ruhr 魯爾區|鲁尔区[Lu3 er3 Qu1], Germany
La Liga, the top division of the Spanish football league system
Napoli, capital of Campania region of Italy/Naples
